column4: hi i was on earlier i have a problem with my laptop not loading up any device i plug into my usb. i have a flash drive that when i plug it in to the computer it doesn't register is there a plug and play software i need to run can any one help please
first check with 'lsusb' whether the drive gets recognized at all.
then use a powered USB2 hub.
there are low limits on how much power a USB port can support.
